channel.title: Leave alternative weapons in game folder?
channel.description:
If you're not going to implement the switchability for the MP5/M4 and the Shotgun in the mod, could you at least leave those alternative versions in the game folders?
Maybe someone else will implement it as sort of a mod for a mod :smiley:

item.title: Leave alternative weapons in game folder?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
Y’know, with having broken their release date already, who knows, maybe they’ll get a chance to actually finish the animation. There’s got to be a lot of pure spec and debate going on around what to do with Xen. I’m sure some of this important debate time could end up leaving time in which no physical work is actually being done, leaving one/some of the animator(s) with extra time one their hands in which they can put together the animation for the hell of it.

I’m not saying that it will happen or that people should ask. Actually more the opposite. Stop asking. We can’t say for certain if the devs will or wont get a chance to work on it now, so any speculation in either direction is pointless.

Read full topic

item.source: Leave alternative weapons in game folder?

item.title: Leave alternative weapons in game folder?
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Looks better now - more American, kinda. More American = better. Sort of. I always wondered why the US Marines would use a German MP with a Russian nade launcher. I KNOW they use MP5s (because, basically, those are badass), but why use a Russian grenade launcher when an American company builds perfectly fitting ones already?:

(Picture not from BM, but close to it, I guess)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Hmm, I only made this thread because at the time they were still using the old MP5 model, and I preferred the M4 one.

Ever since I saw the new MP5 I could care less about the old ones

But if they were to leave the M4 in it would still be nice I suppose, I just love it when there’s unused assets in mah game!
